name: Leveraging Social Resistance Movements
description: Harnessing grassroots movements and social activism to undermine PSN influence and disrupt their power.

cards.title: Building Public Awareness of PSN Manipulation
cards.description: Educating communities about the tactics PSNs use to maintain control.
bulletpoints: Launching information campaigns to expose PSN strategies.
Creating decentralized knowledge networks for public awareness.

cards.title: Creating Community Defense Frameworks
cards.description: Organizing self-sufficient social structures that resist PSN infiltration.
bulletpoints: Developing mutual aid networks for economic independence.
Training communities in defensive psychological tactics.
Promoting decentralized leadership models resistant to PSN corruption.

cards.title: Decentralized Economic Resistance
cards.description: Using alternative economic models to bypass PSN-controlled systems.
bulletpoints: Encouraging cryptocurrency adoption to avoid financial surveillance.
Supporting local economies to reduce dependence on PSN financial networks.
Leveraging barter, trade, and alternative commerce systems.
